tldr: Affected versions of this package are affected by a design flaw that arises from inadequate input validation, specifically relating to the improper handling of escaping and null values when processing dynamic inputs in conjunction with the `??` operator. This vulnerability exposes the system to potential exploitation by malicious actors, who may leverage the weaknesses to execute  Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `twig/twig` library to the patch version.
